K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-1: a'arya dzam bha la dza lendra ya th'a la ddha kalpa n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-3: 'phags pa gnod gnas dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-6: bcom ldan 'das langka'i gling dang nye bar gyur pa rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram na bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa'i rnam par 'jigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-8: zla ba'i sde la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas mngon du byas so; ;de nas der bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la gshegs nas slar babs te dpag bsam gyi shing bi tsu wardha'i rtsa bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-9: de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod gnas rab tu dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-10: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-11: klu'i rgyal po mi zhum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:16b-12: grul bum gyi rgyal po mngon shes lnga pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-0: @17a *// dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-1: srin po'i rgyal po ki li ki la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-2: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gshog pa can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-3: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-6: lha'i bu sprin gyi shugs can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-8: zla ba la mngon par gus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-9: lha'i bu rgyal bas byin rnams nub mo 'das nas tho rangs gsal ba'i dus su bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar lhags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bskor ba lan bdun byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-11: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi 'od kyi kha dog shin tu gsal zhing rgya che ba dpag bsam gyi shing rtsa ba thams cad gsal zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-13: rgya mtsho chen po'i grong khyer du ngo mtshar zhing rmad du gyur pa'i chos brgyad la bzod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-14: ji ltar rtogs pa la khyed rnams bar chad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17a-15: gdon med par ma gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-0: 'di skad du gsungs pas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod gnas rang gi stan las langs te bla gos @17b phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-2: rgya mtsho chen po'i grong khyer du bzod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-3: ji ltar rtogs par byed pa la mngon par dga' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-5: rgya mtsho chen po'i grong khyer du ji ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon khyed rnams ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad la mngon par dga' bar byed pa de ltar rigs kyi bu chos 'di rnams 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-6: dad pas mngon par dga' ba ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad la gnas par de ni tshangs bar spyod pa la gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-7: de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnod gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-9: ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad la gnas pa 'di la nga yis bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:17b-15: 'jig rten pa la rjes su brtse bas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-1: snying po 'di yongs su gzung zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis rtogs pa 'di log par dang sel dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la snying po 'di yongs su dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis kyang snying po 'di yongs su bzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-9: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon khyod kyis gang dus la bab cing mno ba de smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-10: de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnod gnas kyis 'di skad ces smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-11: 'di lta bu'i ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-12: mchod sbyin nang na sbyin sreg gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-13: rig byed rnams na dbyangs can gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-14: mi rnams na ni rgyal po gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-15: chu rnams na ni rgya mtsho gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-16: rgyu skar rnams na zla ba gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-17: drod rnams na ni nyi ma gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-18: steng dang logs dang thad ka na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-19: ji snyed 'gro ba gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-20: gang zhig bsod nams 'dod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-21: tshogs rnams na ni 'phags pa gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-22: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18a-23: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-0: de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnod gnas @18b kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su gnang ba thob nas rang gi sngags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-2: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-3: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-4: aom dzambha la dza lendra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-5: de nas sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu stong gyi gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-6: de nas ji srid phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-7: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams kyis mgrin gcig gis 'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-8: bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-9: ji srid chos kyi rnam grangs sngar ma byung ba'i ngo mtshar rmad du nges par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-10: ji srid chos kyi rnam grangs phan yon chen po ngo mtshar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-13: yongs su skyob pa med pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-14: gnas med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-20: sems can rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-22: mi rnams kyi don du lha dang mi rnams kyi phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:18b-23: bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di rtog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-0: sems can gang gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing bde ba nyid kyis bla na med @19a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-2: de nas yang 'khor gnod sbyin rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-3: nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-7: gnod sbyin la sogs pa bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas rang rang gi stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-8: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de rnams 'khor de rnams dang bcas pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-12: gnod sbyin chen po'i snying po 'di dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-15: gsang chen shin tu ngo mtshar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-16: shin tu rmad du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-28: mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phyag byas shing mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19a-29: sems can rnams la kun tu phan pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-1: dpag bsam gyi shing ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de'i phyir nga yis rjes su gnang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i khung du thos shing grag par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa'i sems can rnams kyis nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-6: klog pa tsam yang nus par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-7: 'on kyang sems can gang snying po 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-8: rjes su gzung bar 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-11: mthong ba tsam gyis nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-14: lus kyi zug rdu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-15: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-16: mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-19: gnod sbyin rnams 'dus pas sngags 'di 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-20: phan yon rtogs par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:19b-21: 'on kyang nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-2: phan yon rgyas par mthar thug pa brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-3: gzhan la gtam tsam yang mi grag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-6: de las gzhan pa'i rgya che ba'i lhas 'di'i yon tan ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-7: shes pa tsam yang mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthar thug pa dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-10: 'di dang 'dra ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa snying po'i mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-11: gdug pa rnams la gnod gnas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-12: phongs pa rnams ni gso bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-13: sems can rnams ni gnas yin zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-14: 'gro ba rnams ni yang dag srung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-15: dbang po kun shes go 'phang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-16: gnod gnas rgyal bar brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-17: mdor na 'di las gzhan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20a-20: 'di 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i gnas yongs su byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-0: de bzhin @20b gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-2: sa thob par 'gyur ro; ;de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gnas pa'i 'khor rnams la gzigs nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-8: gsang chen rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang bstan pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-15: da ltar sh'akya thub pa ngas bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-16: de ni legs par nyon la legs par yid la zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-17: da ltar nga yis bshad kyis lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-19: bde bas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i don du nga yis yang dag par shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:20b-20: gang gis ko sha'i grong khyer du shing khur nas 'tshong pa de'i tshe der nga la dgon pa na sdod pa'i dge slong zhig bud shing gi don du nga la shing slong du 'ongs te; der ngas dgon par shing khyer nas dge slong gi gan du phyin te me sbar nas dge slong gi nad sos par byas te nyi ma gcig gi bsod snyoms kyang drangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-1: nas dge slong de sems yongs su mgu nas des nga la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-5: gsang ba'i rtog pa nga la byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-6: ngas kyang yang dag par bsgoms nas yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-7: de'i tshe sngags kyi rgyal po nga la byin nas de ltar de nyid bsgoms pas tshe de nyid la ji ltar 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po mthong ba'i lam du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-8: de nas de nga la yongs su mgu nas phyag rab tu grol ba zhes bya bar ming btags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-9: der yang nga rgyal por dbang bskur bas grong khyer gyi mi rnams chos dang ldan par byas nas de la nga rgyal por rab tu gnas pas ngas sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nges par sbyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-10: ji ltar don du gnyer ba rnams la skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la dus med par thams cad la nye bar phan pa rang rang gi khyim du rdzogs par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-11: de la sogs pa ngas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs bzhin pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21a-12: rim gyis ngas thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-0: dbul ba thams cad nyams par byed @21b pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-1: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal nye bar gcod pa ngas yang dag par mngon par shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-2: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes shin tu rtogs pa de rnams kyis kyang sngon du sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrubs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-5: khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-6: 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-7: gang zhig mthong ba tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-8: de ni skye ba gcig nas gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-9: sngon du bsags pa'i las rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-10: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-11: de bzhin skye ba 'di la rmongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-12: shin tu sdig pa mi bzang byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-13: gnod sbyin dbang po gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-14: gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-15: byang chub sems dpa' thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-16: sangs rgyas dang ni yang dag phrad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-17: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-18: yun mi ring bar rab 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-19: mthong ba tsam gyis yon tan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-20: nga yis bshad kyis khyod rang nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-21: dbul ba dang ni yid mi bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-22: sems ni nad kyis gzir ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:21b-23: gdon dang byad kyang sgyur ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-1: ro; ;lha dang klu dang dri za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-2: lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-3: de las gzhan yang yid mi bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-4: rtag pa nyid du srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-5: gnod sbyin de nyid mthong tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-6: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-8: bsgrubs par 'gyur na lta ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-9: gang zhig dad pas de bzhin rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-10: gus pas brtags pas gzhan mi 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-11: 'di la gus pas don du gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:22a-12: bslab pa sdom pa sogs pa yis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26a-28: skye bo gang rnams dngos grub 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26a-29: de rnams dbang bskur don du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26a-30: brgyan pa'i don du rab tu 'bad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26a-31: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26a-33: rjes su gnang bas phyag rgya chen po'i skal ba can du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-0: @26b yang mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-1: sbyin sreg byas la bsdu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-3: de ltar gnod gnas kyi bdag po'i dam tshig bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-4: ngag [?] gi sngags sgrub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-5: de nas nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-6: phyag rgyas bdag bsrung ba byas la 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te; zhabs bsil dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-7: mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas nye bar spyod pa'i mchod pa nyi shu sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-8: phyag rgyas phul la cho ga ji ltar tshogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-10: sngags kyi cho gas nga yis rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-11: de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos gus pa nye bar skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs nas seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-14: 'da' bar dka' ba 'di bstan pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid sems can rnams la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:26b-16: gnod gnas kyi dbang po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid sngags dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-0: de nas gnod gnas kyi dbang pos thal mo sbyar te pus mo sa la bzhag ste phyag byas nas ci'ang mi smra bar @27a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das seng+ge bzhin 'jigs pa med pas sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-4: lag pa gnyis thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-5: gung mo gnyis phyir bzlog ming med kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis tshigs gsum pa bcag nas der bzhag ste mthe bong phyogs su bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-6: mtheb mdzub gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-7: 'di bcings pa tsam gyis gnod gnas kyi dbang po nye bar gnas par gyur nas sgrub pa po la lta zhing mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-10: na mo ma ni bha dra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-11: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-12: aom dzam bha la dza len dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-13: sngags 'di dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya yis gnas rnam pa lngar sbyar bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-14: gnod gnas dang so sor mnyam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-15: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas pa ni spyod pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya ste bdag bsrung ba la nges par sbyar bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27a-17: aom tsa ren dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-0: de ltar khu tshur byas te mthe chung gnyis nang du bcug nas srin @27b lag gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas pa ni dbang po gdong gi phyag rgya ste bdag bsrung ba la nges pa ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-1: aom mu khen dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-2: dbang po gdong gi phyag rgya las ming med kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-5: spyan 'dren pa'i dus su'ang gnod sbyin mo rnams spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-8: phyogs bcu ru ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-10: phur bu ste lag pa gnyis khu tshur byas la mdzub mo gnyis so sor khab kyi rtse mo ltar byas pa 'di ni dra ba'i phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-11: aom tsa rendr'a bandha di sha phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-12: ra ba dang nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-13: de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis khab kyi rnam par ltar gcig tu byas pa ni dra ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-15: dra ba'i don du nges par sbyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-16: lag pa gnyis khu tshur byas nas 'og tu bzhag pa ni phur bu'i phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-18: spyan drang bar bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-19: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong cung zad dgug pa ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-20: ae hye tsu lu tsu lu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:27b-22: dz'a la sa ya nam bri y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-1: pa 'dis 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-2: de nas aargha sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-3: lag pa gnyis brtan pa'i thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i ngos la sbyar te 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-4: aom yaksha n'a dha ya ke na dha na pri ya pa sha pa sha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-5: de nas gdan dbul bar bya ste phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gsum pa mnyam par byas nas tshigs gsum par bcag ste dbus mar sbyar nas gzhan so sor byas pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i gdan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-6: 'di bstan pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pas seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-7: seng+ge'i gdan gyi phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-8: aom dzam bha la dza lendr'a aindr'a ya sa ma kam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-9: de nas khrus kyi phyag rgya bcings nas gnod gnas 'khor dang bcas pa khrus gsol bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28a-10: lag pa gnyis yang rten gyis thal mo byas mthe chung gnyis phyin ci log tu byas la ming med gnyis dkyil du byas pa gung mo gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-0: de'i phyi rol tu gung mo'i tshigs gsum sbyar bar mthe bong gnyis phyogs su bzhag pa ni @28b lha thams cad kyi khrus kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-2: aom n'a n'a pri ya gha ta kum bha dzva la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-3: gos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas gos dbul bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-4: yang lag pa gnyis mthe bong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-5: mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud kyi rnam pa ltar byas te sor mo phyi ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni gos kyi phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-6: aom dhi ri dhi ri ma h'a sa mu dra aam dha ra dha ka sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-7: rgyan gyi phyag rgya nye bar bya ste lag pa gnyis sor mo gsum gyi mthe bong bkab nas sdigs mdzub 'khyil ba'i tshul du byas nas phan tshun steng du bskor nas gcig tu byas pa 'di ni rgyan gyi phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-8: aom me gha bha ra na dz'a la bu gha na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-9: yang dag par skyang nul bya ba'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas lag pa g-yon pa nor bu 'ching ba'i mtshams su lag pa'i gdub skor ltar bzung ba ni skyang nul bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-11: aom ha ra ha ra dzo gha n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya nges par bstan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-13: de nyid las sor mo rnams so sor brkyang nas kha 'og tu dbub pa ni dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:28b-15: aom ku ti dzu ga bha ra ta pri y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-1: phreng ba'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya las sor mo rnams kha 'og tu byas nas bzhag pa ni rdul tshon gyi phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-3: he he phen bha li bri ya so bha n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-4: dri'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni lag pa gnyis rten pa'i thal mo sbyar la mthe'u chung khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas nas ming med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-6: mdzub mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-8: aom la l'a g'a la g'a la su gan dha gan dh'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-9: de nas me tog gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni dri'i phyag rgya las mthe bong drang por gyen du sgreng ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-11: aom pushpe pra bha ra pushpe me gha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-12: bdug spos kyi phyag rgya ni me tog gi phyag rgya las tshigs gsum pa cung zad bkug par bya ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-14: aom ru ru mah'a dh'u pa pri y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29a-15: gtor ma'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad longs spyod pa'i rnam par bkod nas mthe'u chung gnyis nang du byas pa ni gter ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-0: aom sa ka sa ka bha ri la dza na gam pa ka @29b ba lim ta yaksha de hi de hi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-1: me mar gyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-2: mthe bong gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas pa ni me mar gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-4: aom phu ru phu ru pra ka s'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-5: dri'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni lag pa g-yas pa khong stong la thur du byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-7: aom ki ni ki ni gandha karna karna gho sham me tri mu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-8: gdugs kyi phyag rgya nye bar gnas pa ni yang lag pa gnyis phan tshun du mngon par phyogs nas gcig tu sbyar zhing nang du zhum nas mthe bong phyogs su bzhag pa ni gdugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-10: aom grihna tsha pra ti yatstsha tr'am ka raksha ka sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-11: rnga yab kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas sor mo lhag ma rdo rje ltar mtshon pas phyogs gnyis ka bskor ba ni rnga yab kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:29b-13: aom tsa ma ra tsa ma ka ra pri ya ke tu tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-0: rlung yab kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo bkab nas sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ste rdo rje ltar mtshon nas yongs su bskor ba ni rlung yab kyi phyag @30a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-2: aom bhe re bha bha yu dha k'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-3: rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong gis ming med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-4: mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-5: gung mo gnyis gcig gi rnam pa ltar byas nas 'og tu bskyod pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-6: aom tu sha tu ka la sa ha dza pri y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-7: gdan gyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa ni yang lag pa gnyis kyi ming med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-8: mthe'u chung rim gyis mnan nas gung mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-9: sdigs mdzub gnyis khab kyi rnam pa ltar byas la steng du bskyod pa ni gdan gyi phyag rgya ste 'di'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-10: dz'a la dz'a ma tu ru khe dza ya na tri pri y'a ya sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-12: 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i nye bar mchod pa nyi shu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-13: sngar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yid las byung ba'i mchod pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-15: thos pas rang bzhin gyi sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-16: phyag rgyas mchod pa 'di thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-17: de nas bdag nyid dbul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30a-19: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-0: de bzhin gshegs @30b pa la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-1: bstod pas mnyes par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-3: ched du brjod pa'i mdo la sogs pa gdon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-4: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gdon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-5: mchod sbyin gyi tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-6: rtag tu chu sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-7: lha thams cad la gtor ma sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-8: 'di rnams thams cad byas la po de tse sngags kyi skud pa yongs su bzung la gnod gnas dang 'dra bar rang bsgoms pa yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-9: aom yig spyi bo dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-10: dzam yig kha ru nges par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-11: bha yig lag pa g-yas par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-12: l'a yig g-yon par dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-13: dza yig snying gar dgod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-14: brla ni g-yas dang g-yon pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-15: len dra nges par dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-16: ye yig mtshan mar dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-17: de nas blo dang ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-18: rkang pa'i mthil du sv'ah'a dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-19: 'di rnams gnod sbyin dbang po rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-20: gsang pa'i snying por rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-21: 'di rnams gang shes blo ldan yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-23: ji ltar nus par bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-24: bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-25: sems can rnams la bsod nams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-26: mnyam par gzhag pas dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:30b-27: ji ltar 'dod pas blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-2: sngar gyi spyan drang phyag rgya las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-3: mthe bo brkyang bas bskyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-4: sngags dang mchod pas gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-5: sngags ni; aom di di ki t'a te ba ga ta aa dzsha gatstsha gatstsha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-6: rim pa 'di yis sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas la phyi nas ji ltar 'dod par bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-7: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-8: ji srid rim pa 'di yis sems can thams cad dbugs chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-13: sems can thams cad khyad par spro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-14: don thams cad sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-15: snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can sems can gang gis gnod gnas kyi dbang po'i rtog pa mnyan par 'dod pa'i don ma lus pa sgrub pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-16: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas gnod gnas kyi rtog pa 'di gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31a-17: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas sngon du bsnyen pa byas la de nas yang gnod gnas kyi dbang po la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-0: me tog gi mchod pa byas @31b na rgya mtsho'i chur zhugs la stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-1: de nas yar ngo'i tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu'i 'gram du phyin nas rked pa nub tsam du chur zhugs te nyin mtshan gcig tu smyung bar gnas nas khyor ba 'bum gyi chu sbyin sreg byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-2: sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis pus mo nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas stong phrag bcu'i sbyin sreg byas na grong bcu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-3: gser srang stong rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-4: chu bo de nyid la rked pa nub tsam chur zhugs nas padma la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-6: sbrang rtsis spags nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na gter gyi bum pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-7: yang sbyor ba de nyid kyis zar ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-8: mya ngan med pa'i yam shing la me sbar te aa pa marka'i snye ma la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-9: sbrang rtsi sbags nas sbyin sreg stong byas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-10: aa pa mrga'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar ba aa pa ma rka'i sa bon zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:31b-12: sbrang rtsis byugs la ming med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-0: mtheb mos bzung nas rang gi khyim du gter mthong bar @32a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-2: de nas nyin re bzhin til gyi me tog zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-4: sbrang rtsis sbags nas dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na don du gnyer pa de 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-5: nyi ma gcig gis 'khor gnyis brgya dang bcas par ma bslangs par bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-7: mya ngan med pa'i me tog la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-9: sbrang rtsis byugs te dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na gang gsol ba btab pa de thob bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-10: mya ngan med kyi me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-11: aa ba mrga'i sa bon bsres la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-13: sbrang rtsis byugs la stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-14: ming bzung nas sbyin sreg de nyid stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i bu de nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-15: me tog dmar po mnyams pa yongs su bzung nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor phyin pa rked pa nub tsam du chur zhugs nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na gang me tog de'i dri tshor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-16: reg pa de rnam pa thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32a-17: cho ga de nyid kyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-0: yang chu de @32b nyid la aa pa mrga'i shing gis sbyin srag stong byas na nyi mas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-1: de ltar man d'a ra ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin gyis mchod ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-2: til gyi me tog gis ni tshangs pas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-3: be ta la'i me tog gis ni nor lhas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-4: sngags de nyid zlos bzhin pas mthe'u chung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-5: mthe bong gnyis kyi gzugs brnyan btsir nas ji srid sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas pa de srid gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro; ;de nas dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-6: 'bum phrag bzlas pas rgyal po 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-7: yang na dka' bas zla ba drug tu mi smra bar bzlas na yid la gang 'dod pas de rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:32b-8: rgyal po'i aarga'i rang bzhin gyi shing la gzugs brnyan byas la ma bcos pa'i kha dog gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de nyid kyi mdun du zla ba drug tu mi smra bar bzlas na lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sngags khri mngon par bzlas la gter gang na yod pa'i sar phyin nas steng du lag pa bzhag ste sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na gter thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-0: dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes lnga la mya ngan med @33a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-1: kyi rtsa ba na gnas pas nyin mtshan du gso sbyong gis gnas shing nyin mtshan par chod kyi zas za bas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg byas na dgos pa thams cad sgrub par nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-2: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-3: zho bsres nas sreg blugs stong byas na gser srang stong ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-4: aa pa mrga'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-6: sbra rtsis mngon par sbags nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas pas shin tu shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-7: tshigs bcad stong yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-8: aarga'i rtsa ba la cho ga 'dis sor mo drug pa'i gzugs brnyan cod pan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-9: thor tshugs ldan par byas la de'i mdun aa pa marga'i yam shing la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-10: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-11: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-12: mah'a yaksha se n'a ba ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-13: so ma ma so pi ta kri ni ya mi ri ti ma ni ri ti sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-14: sngags 'dis sbyin sreg stong byas na dong rtse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-15: gnod gnas kyi snying po'i mchog rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33a-16: 'di nyid kyis gnas pas pus mo nub tsam du chur zhugs nas 'bum phrag drug bzlas na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-0: nim pa'i shing gi rang bzhin @33b la chu zheng du sor bzhin mnyam pa'i nor bu bzang po byas la gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bris la nye bar mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-1: gtor ma byin nas du ba med pa'i me la dus gsum du de'i mdun du rgya skyegs kyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na phyug po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-2: legs par yan lag ster ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-3: rmad gyur chen po'i brtson 'grus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-4: ltos pa med pa'i snying rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-5: yang dag ji bzhin ston pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-7: thams cad du ni skyon med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-8: sdug bsngal pa ni nyon mongs nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-9: dzam bha la yi sgom pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-10: de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i snying po rgyas par bshad pa ni mchog gi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-11: bskul ba'i yi ge dang yang dag par ldan pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-13: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-14: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-15: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-21: ma ri tsi mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-22: tu lu tu lu ma ni bha dra; tu ru tu ru ma ni bha dra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-23: tu ti tu ti ma ni bha dra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-24: ti ti ti ti ma ni bha dr'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-25: tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:33b-26: smyung ba'i cho ga yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-2: gzhan pa rnams la nor bu bzang po'i gzugs byas te de'i mdun du 'dug la nyi ma phyed kyi dus su dra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-3: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas yungs kar gyi tsha ba'i mar nag dang btags pa'i ril bu byas te nor bu bzang po'i ltor bcug nas rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dong rtse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-4: de nyid du zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rtog pa gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-6: gang gi lo ma btsos pa za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-7: bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad du bzlas pa byas na nor mang po rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-9: zla ba drug tu chu nang du chu'i sbyin sreg byas na stong phrag brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-10: ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-11: mchod pa phul la aa shvatha'i yam shing gi zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-13: sbrang rtsi spags nas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na bar snang las sgra thos pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-14: yid la 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'bras bu 'grub ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34a-15: sems kyis byas pas tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-0: de bzhin du @34b las sna tshogs gzhan 'grub ste ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-1: nag po'i phyogs la bsod snyoms za zhing re mos kyis smyung bar gnas nas gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-2: mchod pa cho ga bzhin byin nas til nag po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-4: sbrang rtsis sbags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na grong mchog bcu gnyis rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-5: bag med pas las ma grub na stong phrag bcu'i nang nas grong gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-6: chu bo'i 'gram du nor bu bzang po bzhag nas mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-7: 'o thug za zhing mchod rten gdung dang ldan pa la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas gnam stong la mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas dza ti'i me tog la stong phrag brgyad du re re la mngon par sngags nas mchod rten la phul na nang bar phyugs stong phrag ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-8: bsod snyoms za zhing rigs gtsang ma la dus gsum du khrus byed cing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas nag po'i phyogs kyi brgyad la mtshan mo smyung bar gnas la 'dzam bu'i yam shing la me sbar la n'a ga pushpa zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-10: sbrang rtsis sbags nas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:34b-11: mngar gsum gyi bshos gtsang ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-0: @35a *// gtor ma byin nas sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-1: bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas nga yis ci byed ces smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-2: de la smra ba dong rtse lnga byin cig ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-3: de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur te nyin re bzhin du ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-4: lhag ma med par zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-5: padma skyes pa'i mtsho'i 'gram du phyin te chu dang bcas pa'i phye za ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-6: yang ji ltar rnyed pa'i zas za zhing nor bu bzang po'i kha phyir bstan par bzhag la gsol ba btab nas ji srid du stong phrag brgya rdzogs par padmo'i sbyin sreg byas na de'i rjes la dpal mo 'ongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-7: 'ongs pa la de la padma nye bar phul nas dri dang bcas pa'i chu'i aargham byin na des smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-8: bu; ci zhig bya zhes smras na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-9: sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-10: gter mang po bdag la rab tu stsol cig de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-11: de nas gang du 'gro ba der khyer nas phyin pa de zad pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35a-12: nor bu bzang po'i mdun du zla ba phyed du bzlas nas ji srid zla ba nye'i nub mo smyung bar gnas pas sha med pa'i gtor ma phyin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-0: de nas nor bu bzang po'i snying gar ming med bzhag nas ci @35b srid du bzlas pa de srid du g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-1: de nas nyin re bzhin du dong tse lnga lnga re ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-2: lhag ma med par zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-3: dur khrod chen por phyin nas dur khrod kyi thal ba la mchod rten byas te bsod snyoms za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas la nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi la mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas lhag ma med par rab tu zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-4: dur khrod chen por nor bu bzang po la sha ta pushpa phul la aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-5: du ru ska bsres pa'i bdug pa phul te gdong phyin ci log tu bzhag nas ji srid mtshan phyed pa de srid du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-6: de nas sha za'i bdag po rang 'ongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-7: sngar bzhag pa'i gtor ma phul la 'khor rnams la chang yang dbul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-8: de nas sgrub pa pos gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-9: de nas deng mgu'o zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-11: nyi ma re re g-yog re re byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-12: de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-13: de nas mngags gzhug pa la sogs par rab tu sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:35b-15: de bzhin gshegs pas las kyi tshogs bya ba gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-0: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te khru gang tsam gyi nor bu bzang po @36a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-2: 'o thug za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi nya la thug pa'i mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas nas nor bu bzang po la rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-3: gtor ma'i cho ga rgya che ba byas nas ku sha'i chun po dag byin nas ji srid sgra grags pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-4: de nas de ma thag tu gnod sbyin thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas de rnams la me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-7: du ru ska'i bdug pa'ang bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-8: de nas gnod sbyin des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-9: ngas khyod la ci byed ces zer ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-10: de nas de la smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-11: nyin re bzhin mngag gzhug rab tu byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-12: de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-13: de la sogs pa bsam gtan tsam gyis gnas pa la ma mthong bar 'khor gyis bskor nas gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-16: der khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36a-17: lha'i bzhon pa sprul te stong phrag gcig dang bcas pa la rab tu 'dod pa'i zas rnams ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-0: nyin re bzhin du gnod sbyin mor @36b sprul zhing 'ongs nas tho rangs kyi dus su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-1: de nyid kyi tshe lo stong du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-2: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du nor bu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan bzhag ste bsod snyoms za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes lnga la thug par nub gsum du smyung bar gnas pas rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar phyin nas ci srid rgya mtsho chen po rang 'ong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-3: mdun du rgya mtsho chen po rang 'ong ba de la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-4: me tog gi mchod pa phul la aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-6: mchog gang 'dod pa rab tu sbyin par smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-8: rgya mtsho chen por nga thogs pa med par 'gro bar gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-9: de ltar bya zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-10: de nas rgya mtsho la zhugs na rgya mtsho na yod pa'i nor bu rin po che blangs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;rgya mtsho [?] yod pa'i klu rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dbyangs snyan gyi sngags gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-13: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:36b-14: mah'a yaksha se n'a ba ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-1: rtsa ba'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-2: yang na dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas ro hi ta'i nya la ba'i lci ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-3: mar gyis byugs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dong tse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-6: sngon du 'bum tsho gsum bzlas na nya ma god pa la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-8: sbrang rtsis mngon par byugs nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na dong tse stong phrag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-9: ma grub na'ang k'a ra sha pa ni stong phrag gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-10: aom badzra dzam bha la dza len dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-12: de nas yang nor bu bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na mchod sbyin gyi shing dkar po la nor bu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan byas la mchod pa chen po rab tu gnas par byas na sde'i mdun du aa pa mrga'i yam shing la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-13: sbrang rtsis phyugs la 'bum phrag tu sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-14: pe ta la'i me tog rnams kyis 'bum phrag tu sbyin sreg byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-16: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37a-17: de ltar sha ta pushpa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-3: du ru ska la sogs pa de rnams re re 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na dong tse stong phrag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-5: 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-6: nye'u ji ltar 'tshong pa nyos la chu bo'i gzhung la lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas kha shar du bltas te sbyin sreg brgya byas na sum 'gyur gyi dong tse rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-7: ras bal gyi sa bon la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-8: sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyi bar la ras gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-9: rtag tu bzlas na gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-11: 'bum bzlas na dong tse lnga stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-12: 'bum tsho gnyis bzlas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-13: 'bum tsho gsum bzlas na longs spyod chen po rnyed par 'gyur zhing grong brgyad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-14: be'u'i lci ba la sbyin sreg stong byas na ba glang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-16: dud 'gro rnams kyi lus la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-17: sbrang rtsis sbags la nyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas na ra lug la sogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-18: ba lang gi lhas kyi nang du ku sha'i me tog mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:37b-19: sbrang rtsis sbags la nyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'byung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-2: rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-3: ji ltar 'dod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-4: yang ba lang gi lhas kyi nang du 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-5: 'o thug za zhing shri ri pa la'i yam shing la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gang 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-6: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas la zla ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-7: nyi ma gzas gzung ba la ldong ros dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-8: gi wang srang lngas aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bzhi la g-yas skor g-yon skor du bzhag nas yang 'dab ma bzhis g-yogs la ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-10: 'bar bas 'di ltar sa bla sa 'og sa steng gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-11: ba lang gi lhas kyi nang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-12: chu bo 'dus par bsod snyoms za ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-13: 'o thug za bas aarga'i 'o thug mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-14: sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong tsho lnga sbyin sreg byas na rang nyid kyis nor gyi bdag po nor bu bzang po nor gyi bdag po nor dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-15: nga mgu'o zhes de smra na mchog brgyad gang 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38a-19: thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-3: lus srul po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-4: dran pa tsam gyis mdun du 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-5: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sems can shi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-8: sa 'og gi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'jig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-12: rjes su bzung ba brgyad po 'di rnams las de'i mdun du gang na gang gcig blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-13: des gang ci 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-15: sbrang rtsis byugs nas 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na padma r'a ka'i nor bu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-16: de ltar autpa la sngon po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-17: ku mu da rnams dri zhim po dang ldan pas kha dog sna tshogs pa'i nor bu rin po che rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-18: yungs kar dkar po mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-19: sbrang rtsis byugs la gang gi ming nas bzung nas sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-20: til nag po la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-21: sbrang rtsis sbags la 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na nor nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-22: aarga'i shing la me btang la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyis nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:38b-23: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas sha ta pushpa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-4: gu gul rnams ji ltar 'tshong ba nyos la mchod pa byas nas mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-5: sbrang rtsis sngags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun na bdun 'gyur gyi nor rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-6: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-7: gzhan nye bar 'gyur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-10: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-11: mah'a yaksha se na pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-12: ki ni ki ni gha tta ka rna sva ba nam me dha ra sa ma ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-13: aarga'i mar khus ku mu da'i me tog sbyin sreg byas na rmi lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-14: ki ni ki ni gan da karna tsi tram me dha ra y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-15: don nges par ster na cho ga ji ltar brjod pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-16: 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-17: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-004:39a-18: bod kyi lotstsha ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o ////
